âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Hides windows from screensharing â€¢ Hides windows from taskbar and taskswitcher (Alt-Tab) â€¢ Allows normal use of hidden windows â€¢ GUI and CLI interface â€¢ Winget installation support
ðŸ“– Summary: WinHider is a C++ application designed to hide specific windows from being visible during screen sharing sessions and from the taskbar/taskswitcher. This allows users to maintain privacy and reduce distractions while still being able to interact with the hidden applications. It offers both a graphical user interface (GUI) and a command-line interface (CLI) for managing window visibility.
